channel.title: [PI] - RunServer.Bat Reloading?
channel.description: When I first downloaded this base, PvPScape PI Source/Client, it worked perfectly fine, I changed it all to Local Host 0.0.0.0 and logged in just as I normally would. But after I exited it. When I try to load RunServer.Bat it opens it, and keeps opening them, and more and more. It doesn't just run one to run the server. Can someone PLEASE help me with this problem fast? Please and Thank you. [code]@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server start Run-Server.bat pause[/code]

item.title: [PI] - RunServer.Bat Reloading?
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

remove Start Run-Server.bat

theres no need for that line, it’s telling the program to open the program that you just opened, again.

item.title: [PI] - RunServer.Bat Reloading?
item.dc:creator: @No_Faith No Faith
item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

When I first downloaded this base, PvPScape PI Source/Client, it worked perfectly fine, I changed it all to Local Host 0.0.0.0 and logged in just as I normally would. But after I exited it. When I try to load RunServer.Bat it opens it, and keeps opening them, and more and more. It doesn’t just run one to run the server. Can someone PLEASE help me with this problem fast?
Please and Thank you.

@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server start Run-Server.bat pause
